description: Skills library index for pattern discovery and reuse - Anthropic folder structure format
usage: Agent reads this to discover similar skills before creating new ones. Enables evolutionary skill development where new skills build on proven patterns from existing implementations.

migration_status.note: All skills migrated to folder structure. Flat files kept for 30-day backward compatibility period.

skills.name: get_clinical_trials
skills.description: Generic skill to get clinical trials for ANY therapeutic area, drug, or condition with optional phase filtering
skills.function_signature: get_clinical_trials(term: str, phase: str = None) -> dict

skills.name: get_drug_chemical_properties
skills.description: Retrieves comprehensive chemical properties for specific drugs from PubChem using dynamic drug name lookup. Works for any specific drugs (not drug classes).

skills.name: get_covid19_vaccine_trials_recruiting
skills.description: Get recruiting COVID-19 vaccine trials

skills.name: get_disease_burden_per_capita
skills.description: Calculate true disease burden per capita by combining WHO health indicators with Data Commons population data. Demonstrates multi-server integration with intelligent per-capita rate calculation. Supports 32 countries.
skills.cli_help: Calculate disease burden per capita for any disease indicator

skills.name: get_disease_genetic_targets
skills.function_signature: get_disease_genetic_targets(disease_name: str, top_n: int = 10, max_fetch: int = 500) -> dict
skills.cli_help: Get genetic targets for any disease from Open Targets

skills.name: get_glp1_fda_drugs
skills.description: Get FDA approved GLP-1 drugs with deduplication (21 unique drugs)

skills.name: get_kras_inhibitor_fda_drugs
skills.description: Get FDA approved KRAS inhibitor drugs

skills.name: get_pharma_company_stock_data
skills.cli_help: Get stock data for pharmaceutical companies

skills.name: get_ultra_rare_metabolic_targets
skills.cli_help: Find therapeutic targets for ultra-rare metabolic diseases

skills.name: get_indication_drug_pipeline_breakdown
skills.description: Active drug pipeline analysis for any indication showing phase breakdown, unique drug counts, FDA approval status, company/sponsor attribution with M&A tracking, and elegant ASCII visualization. Tracks lead sponsors with automatic M&A attribution (e.g., Celgene trials → Bristol Myers Squibb) and provides competitive analysis showing trials/phases/drugs/approvals per company.

skills.name: get_indication_pipeline_attrition
skills.description: Track terminated and withdrawn clinical trials for any therapeutic area to identify failure patterns and competitive intelligence

skills.name: get_companies_by_moa
skills.description: Comprehensive competitive query tool to identify companies working on specific mechanisms of action with full trial analysis. Provides company breakdown with trial counts, development phases, drug names, and FDA approval status. Includes competitive assessment (leaders, late-stage, early-stage).
skills.function_signature: get_companies_by_moa(moa: str, disease: str = None, phase_filter: str = 'Phase 1', include_academic: bool = False, sample_size: int = None) -> dict

skills.name: get_company_clinical_trials_portfolio
skills.function_signature: get_company_clinical_trials_portfolio(sponsor_name: str, status: str = None, condition: str = None, phase: str = None, start_year: int = 2020) -> dict
skills.cli_help: Get clinical trials portfolio for any pharmaceutical company

skills.name: analyze_company_product_launch_timeline
skills.function_signature: analyze_company_product_launch_timeline(company_name: str, focus_area: str = None, start_year: int = 2020, end_year: int = None) -> dict
skills.cli_help: Analyze product launch timeline for pharmaceutical company

skills.name: forecast_drug_pipeline
skills.function_signature: forecast_drug_pipeline(search_criteria: dict, completion_years: list = None, phase: str = 'PHASE3', approval_offset_years: int = 2) -> dict
skills.cli_help: Forecast drug pipeline completions by route, therapeutic area, or sponsor

skills.name: get_company_pipeline_indications
skills.description: Generic skill to identify therapeutic areas and indications where ANY pharmaceutical company is actively developing drugs by analyzing their clinical trial pipeline

skills.name: get_obesity_drugs_early_development
skills.description: FDA-approved obesity drugs with active Phase 1/2 development programs. Uses known drug names list (FDA best practice) to avoid false positives from broad term searches. Multi-server query correlating FDA approvals with ongoing CT.gov trials. Returns 6 drugs with 502 total early-stage trials. High pageSize=1000 to capture all results without pagination.
skills.data_scope: 6 FDA approved obesity drugs, all 6 with active early development (502 total trials)
skills.fda_best_practice: Uses specific drug names instead of broad 'obesity' search to avoid false positives (83 drugs -> 6 correct drugs)

skills.name: get_rare_disease_acquisition_targets
skills.description: Yahoo Finance complete financial intelligence for M&A targeting - v3.0. Cash runway calculation from operating cash flow, 6 distress signals, debt/liquidity analysis. 30% enrichment coverage, 60% faster execution vs v2.2.

skills.name: generate_drug_swot_analysis
skills.cli_help: Generate SWOT analysis for pharmaceutical product

skills.name: get_pharma_revenue_replacement_needs
skills.description: Quantifies pharmaceutical company 2030-2035 revenue replacement needs by analyzing patent expiries, revenue at risk, and franchise-specific deficits using SEC EDGAR XBRL revenue data, FDA drug portfolio counts, and industry-standard patent cliff models

skills.name: generate_company_swot_analysis
skills.description: Generate comprehensive strategic SWOT analysis for pharmaceutical companies with active clinical pipeline filtering

skills.name: get_large_tam_clinical_programs
skills.development_notes: Data quality issues identified: (1) Search terms too broad (e.g., 'liver fibrosis' captures non-NASH trials), (2) TAM estimates use 5% fallback when WHO fails, (3) Regional TAM based only on population not pricing, (4) Acquisition probability scoring unvalidated. Needs Tier 1-5 improvements before production use.

skills.name: fda-approvals-timeline-by-indication
skills.description: Fully generic FDA drug approval timeline analyzer - accepts any therapeutic area and drug list with visual timeline and trend analysis

skills.name: get_products_by_approval_pathway
skills.description: Find FDA-approved drugs by regulatory approval pathway using hybrid adverse events discovery. Queries patient.drug.drugindication field for comprehensive therapeutic area coverage, then cross-references with submission metadata for pathway filtering (priority review, orphan designation, standard review). Solves FDA sparse submission metadata problem with 100% therapeutic area coverage.
skills.function_signature: get_products_by_approval_pathway(pathway: str, therapeutic_area: str, count_type: str = 'submissions', show_progress: bool = False) -> dict
health_issues: Therapeutic area filtering returns wrong drugs (finds drugs taken BY patients with condition, not drugs approved FOR condition)
Returns comorbid condition drugs (e.g., arthritis drugs for Alzheimer patients)
Uses patient.drug.drugindication (patient diagnosis) instead of drug label indication

skills.name: catalyst-tracker
skills.function_signature: track_catalysts(quarter="Q1", year=2026, companies=None, max_companies=100, include_predicted=True, min_prediction_probability=0.6, deduplicate=True, verbose=True) -> dict

skills.name: integrated-catalyst-discovery
skills.description: End-to-end catalyst discovery combining bottom-up trial discovery with multi-source catalyst tracking
skills.function_signature: discover_catalysts(quarter="Q4", year=2025, phases=None, min_market_cap=0, max_discovery_trials=5000, max_tracking_companies=100, include_predicted=True, min_prediction_probability=0.6, verbose=True) -> dict

skills.name: trial-completion-predictor
skills.description: Predicts conference presentations based on trial completion dates and therapeutic area matching

skills.name: abstract-acceptance-tracker
skills.description: Tracks conference abstract acceptance announcements from SEC 8-K filings

skills.name: bottom-up-catalyst-discovery
skills.description: Automated bottom-up pipeline discovering investable biotech companies with upcoming catalysts from ClinicalTrials.gov
skills.function_signature: discover_catalyst_candidates(quarter='Q4', year=2025, phases=None, min_market_cap=0, max_trials=5000, verbose=True) -> dict

skills.name: alk-rearrangement-trials
skills.description: Retrieves clinical trials for ALK rearrangement positive cancers with status distribution analysis

skills.name: pdufa-tracker
skills.description: Tracks FDA PDUFA action dates from SEC 8-K filings

skills.name: cdc-obesity-prevalence
skills.description: Get CDC obesity prevalence data for the United States from Data Commons

skills.name: global-diabetes-prevalence
skills.description: Fetches authoritative global diabetes prevalence data from WHO and Data Commons

skills.name: us-cardiometabolic-disease-prevalence
skills.description: Search US epidemiological data for cardiovascular and metabolic comorbidities

pagination.description: Patterns for handling large datasets across multiple API pages

fda_queries.description: FDA drug database search patterns (JSON response)

strategic_analysis.description: Multi-server composite skills for strategic decision-making and competitive analysis

financial_analysis.description: SEC EDGAR and financial data analysis patterns

competitive_intelligence.description: Competitive landscape and market analysis patterns

target_validation.description: Target discovery and validation using Open Targets and clinical data

ct_gov_searches.pagination: Use glp1-trials/scripts/get_glp1_trials.py as reference for pagination implementation
ct_gov_searches.status_filtering: Use uppercase format: RECRUITING, COMPLETED, etc.

fda_searches.deduplication: Use glp1-fda-drugs/scripts/get_glp1_fda_drugs.py as reference for drug deduplication

folder_structure.format: skill-name/ with SKILL.md and scripts/ subdirectory
folder_structure.discovery: Use discover_skills.py to find skills by pattern, server, or category

deprecation_notice.flat_files: All flat structure files (.py and .md at root) are deprecated as of 2025-11-19
deprecation_notice.action_required: Update imports to use folder structure: from .claude.skills.{folder}.scripts.{function} import {function}
deprecation_notice.backward_compatibility: Flat files kept during grace period for backward compatibility
